short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically create Kanban Flow Task from selection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to automatically create task at kanbanflow.com by selection any text from any page. Only dashboards with swimlanes are supported. 

To use extension you need to set up kanbanflow.com token. Visit kanbanflow.com and create token with "create task" permission and then configure it at extension settings page.
